definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: If time is not pressing, sieges or neutralization will be likely options of choice.
sentences.chinese: 假按时分没有平静，也能够或许选择围攻或水力压抑。

sentences.english: However, new trapped emotions could possibly form a new wall.
sentences.chinese: 可是，新的压抑情绪可能会筑造一道新墙。

sentences.english: This kind of architectural style depresses me.
sentences.chinese: 这种建筑风格让我感到很压抑。

sentences.english: Maybe heaviness or constriction in different parts of your body.
sentences.chinese: 也许是你身体不同部分的沉重和压抑。

sentences.english: I could not control and make self-repression on such rational basic.
sentences.chinese: 我做不到这么理性的克制和压抑自我。

sentences.english: They don't in any strict sense repress it.
sentences.chinese: 他们不会压抑这些回忆。

sentences.english: But that wild music burthens every bough.
sentences.chinese: 只是那野曲压抑着枝条。
你得让被压抑的感情发泄出来。

sentences.english: I feel lots of pressure when live with you.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得和你在一起生活很压抑。

sentences.english: At odd and unexpected times, you may experience periods of sexual inhibition for no logical reason.
sentences.chinese: 你有可能会不定时毫无理由的经历性压抑期。

sentences.english: You will feel the appetite suppressant effects working immediately within the same day.
sentences.chinese: 你会感到压抑食欲，影响工作立即在同一天。

sentences.english: Low clear height also makes people feel depressed.
sentences.chinese: 净高过低还使人感到压抑。

sentences.english: Warm winds make many people feel enervated and depressed.
sentences.chinese: 热风使得很多人感到疲乏和压抑。

sentences.english: or the fact that it just looks so depressing, you know.
sentences.chinese: 或者它看起来太压抑了。

sentences.english: Yeah, you may have been ripped off, short-sheeted and done wrong.
sentences.chinese: 噢，你可能已被撕裂，短期压抑和做错事。

sentences.english: Bad environments suppress children's I. Q.
sentences.chinese: 不良环境压抑了儿童的智商。

definition: to feel oppressed/to be depressed/to feel dejected
to drain (by leading off water)/to unburden oneself/to divulge/to leak a secret
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
